folder.name: dp-203/02-Serverless SQL/04-Demo-Analyze data in a lake database

content.query:
-- Demo: Analyze data in a lake database
-- Task: Query RetailDB

--Make sure to connect to the Build-In, default database
SELECT TOP (100) [CustomerId]
    ,[FirstName]
    ,[LastName]
    ,[EmailAddress]
    ,[Phone]
 FROM [RetailDB].[dbo].[Customer]

 SELECT TOP (100) [ProductId]
    ,[ProductName]
    ,[IntroductionDate]
    ,[ActualAbandonmentDate]
    ,[ProductGrossWeight]
    ,[ItemSku]
    ,[ListPrice]
 FROM [RetailDB].[dbo].[Product]


 SELECT TOP (100) [SalesOrderId]
,[OrderDate]
,[LineItemId]
,[CustomerId]
,[ProductId]
,[Quantity]
 FROM [RetailDB].[dbo].[SalesOrder]
